attributes.action: change the law and make it a requirement for ALL children's pyjamas to be flame resistant, meeting flammability requirement BS 5722 and IS 148, which currently only applies to nightdresses and dressing gowns and not pyjamas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British law requires nightdresses and most dressing gowns to be flame resistant, but historically pyjamas have been exempt because they are close fitting.
